TeamRoles.description:
Valid values for team roles.

    Roles follow Jetstream conventions:
    - ADMIN: Full permissions (create, read, update, delete)
    - EDITOR: Limited permissions (read, create, update)
    - MEMBER: Basic read-only access

    Note: Team ownership is tracked separately via is_owner on TeamMember.
TeamRoles.title: TeamRoles

post.description:
Add a member to a team, or send an invitation if the user doesn't exist.

If the user exists in the system, they are added directly as a team member.
If the user doesn't exist, an invitation email is sent to them to sign up
and join the team.

Returns:
    Message describing whether the user was added or invited.

Raises:
    ValidationException: If the user is already a member or has a pending invitation.

400.description: Bad request syntax or unsupported method
